meta.name: OpengMDUV380
meta.description: This document describes the codeplug format of the OpenGD77 firmware running on a MD-UV380.

meta.name: UHF min frequency
meta.description: in MHz.

meta.name: UHF max frequency
meta.description: in MHz.

meta.name: VHF min frequency
meta.description: in MHz.

meta.name: VHF max frequency
meta.description: Maximum frequency for VHF band in MHz.

meta.name: Channel Bank 0
meta.description: The first channel bank.

meta.name: Channel bit map
meta.description: Marks, which channels are valid.

meta.name: Channel bit
meta.description: Enables a single channel.

meta.name: Channels
meta.description: Encodes all valid channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single channel.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the channel name.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: RX Frequency in 10Hz as 8-digit BCD in little endian.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: TX Frequency in 10Hz in 8-digit BCD little endian.

meta.name: Channel Mode
meta.description: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Power
meta.description: Specifies the transmit power.

meta.name: Latitude LSB
meta.brief: LSB of the uint24le complex encoding of the latitude.
meta.description: The LSB of the 24bit latitude value.

meta.name: Latitude MSB
meta.brief: MSB of the uint24le encoding the latitude.
meta.description: Encodes the latitude in sign, degree and decimals. The MSB holds the sign bit, the next 8 bit encode the degrees and the least significant 15 bits encode 4 decimals.

meta.name: Longitude LSB
meta.brief: Least significant part of the uin24le encoding the longitude.

meta.name: RX Tone
meta.description: Encoded as uint16le. MSB (15) is DCS/CTCSS flag and bit 14 flags inverted DCS codes. The rest is 3-digit BCD containing CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz or octal DCS code. Boy, what a s**t. ffffh means disabled.

meta.name: TX Tone
meta.description: Encoded as uint16le. MSB (15) is DCS/CTCSS flag and bit 14 flags inverted DCS codes. The rest is 3-digit BCD containing CTCSS frequency in 0.1Hz or octal DCS code. Boy, what a s**t. ffffh means disabled.

meta.name: Longitude MSB
meta.brief: Most significant byte of the uint24le encoding the longitude.
meta.description: Encodes the longitude in sign, degree and decimals. The MSB holds the sign bit, the next 8 bit encode the degrees and the least significant 15 bits encode 4 decimals.

meta.name: Override DMR ID
meta.description: If enabled, the DMR ID is overridden.

meta.name: Use Location
meta.description: Whatever that means.

meta.name: Channel DMR ID
meta.description: If enabled, holds the DMR ID used for this channel. Somewhat weird in uint24be.

meta.name: Group List Index
meta.description: Specifies the group list index +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: Color code
meta.description: Simply stores the color code as is.

meta.name: APRS System Index
meta.description: Index of the APRS system associated with the channes +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit talker alias on time slot 2

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit the talker alias on time-slot 1.

meta.name: Time slot 2
meta.description: If enabled, time slot 2 is used. Otherwise TS 1.

meta.name: VOX enable
meta.description: Enabled VOX for this channel.

meta.name: Skip in Zone Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the channel is skipped during a zone scan.

meta.name: Skip Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the cannel is skipped in all scans.

meta.name: TX disable
meta.description: If enabled, the TX is disabled. That is, the channel is RX only.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.description: Specifies the FM bandwidth.

meta.name: Squelch Level
meta.description: 0: Global setting, 1: open, 2-14: 5%(n-1), 15: closed.

meta.name: VFO Channel A
meta.brief: Encodes the settings for VFO A.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the channel name.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: RX Frequency in 10Hz as 8-digit BCD in little endian.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: TX Frequency in 10Hz in 8-digit BCD little endian.

meta.name: Channel Mode
meta.description: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Power
meta.description: Specifies the transmit power.

meta.description: Specifies the group list index +1. Default 0: none.

meta.description: Simply stores the color code as is.

meta.description: Index of the APRS system associated with the channes +1. Default 0: none.

meta.description: How to transmit talker alias on time slot 2

meta.description: How to transmit the talker alias on time-slot 1.

meta.description: If enabled, time slot 2 is used. Otherwise TS 1.

meta.description: Enabled VOX for this channel.

meta.description: If enabled, the cannel is skipped in all scans.

meta.description: 0: Global setting, 1: open, 2-14: 5%(n-1), 15: closed.

meta.brief: Encodes the settings for VFO B.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the channel name.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: RX Frequency in 10Hz as 8-digit BCD in little endian.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: TX Frequency in 10Hz in 8-digit BCD little endian.

meta.description: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Use Location
meta.description: Whatever that means.

meta.name: Channel DMR ID
meta.description: If enabled, holds the DMR ID used for this channel. Somewhat weird in uint24be.

meta.name: Group List Index
meta.description: Specifies the group list index +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: Color code
meta.description: Simply stores the color code as is.

meta.name: APRS System Index
meta.description: Index of the APRS system associated with the channes +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit talker alias on time slot 2

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit the talker alias on time-slot 1.

meta.name: Time slot 2
meta.description: If enabled, time slot 2 is used. Otherwise TS 1.

meta.name: VOX enable
meta.description: Enabled VOX for this channel.

meta.name: Skip in Zone Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the channel is skipped during a zone scan.

meta.name: Skip Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the cannel is skipped in all scans.

meta.name: TX disable
meta.description: If enabled, the TX is disabled. That is, the channel is RX only.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.description: Specifies the FM bandwidth.

meta.name: Squelch Level
meta.description: 0: Global setting, 1: open, 2-14: 5%(n-1), 15: closed.

meta.name: Zone Bank
meta.description: Hold the zone bitmap as well as the actual zones.

meta.name: Zone bitmap
meta.description: Encodes which zone is valid. Encodes only 68 bits.

meta.name: Zone enable bit
meta.description: Enables a particular zone.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the zone name.

meta.name: Channel Index
meta.description: Index of the channel +1. 0=unused.

meta.name: Right ascension of the ascending node
Unused
meta.brief: set to blank bh.

meta.name: CTCSS tone frequency
meta.brief: Encoded frequency in 0.1Hz.

meta.name: Channel Bank
meta.description: The first channel bank.

meta.name: Channel bit map
meta.description: Marks, which channels are valid.

meta.name: Channel bit
meta.description: Enables a single channel.

meta.name: Channels
meta.description: Encodes all valid channels.

meta.name: Channel
meta.brief: Encodes a single channel.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the channel name.

meta.name: RX Frequency
meta.description: RX Frequency in 10Hz as 8-digit BCD in little endian.

meta.name: TX Frequency
meta.description: TX Frequency in 10Hz in 8-digit BCD little endian.

meta.name: Channel Mode
meta.description: Specifies the mode of the channel.

meta.name: Power
meta.description: Specifies the transmit power.

meta.brief: Most significant byte of the uint24le encoding the longitude.
meta.description: Encodes the longitude in sign, degree and decimals. The MSB holds the sign bit, the next 8 bit encode the degrees and the least significant 15 bits encode 4 decimals.

meta.name: Override DMR ID
meta.description: If enabled, the DMR ID is overridden.

meta.name: Use Location
meta.description: Whatever that means.

meta.name: Channel DMR ID
meta.description: If enabled, holds the DMR ID used for this channel. Somewhat weird in uint24be.

meta.name: Group List Index
meta.description: Specifies the group list index +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: Color code
meta.description: Simply stores the color code as is.

meta.name: APRS System Index
meta.description: Index of the APRS system associated with the channes +1. Default 0: none.

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit talker alias on time slot 2

meta.name: TX Alias TS1
meta.description: How to transmit the talker alias on time-slot 1.

meta.name: Time slot 2
meta.description: If enabled, time slot 2 is used. Otherwise TS 1.

meta.name: VOX enable
meta.description: Enabled VOX for this channel.

meta.name: Skip in Zone Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the channel is skipped during a zone scan.

meta.name: Skip Scan
meta.description: If enabled, the cannel is skipped in all scans.

meta.name: TX disable
meta.description: If enabled, the TX is disabled. That is, the channel is RX only.

meta.name: Bandwidth
meta.description: Specifies the FM bandwidth.

meta.name: Squelch Level
meta.description: 0: Global setting, 1: open, 2-14: 5%(n-1), 15: closed.

meta.name: Contacts
meta.description: A list of up to 1024 contact elements. Empty names indicate invalid entries. Probably dense. That is, the list ends with the first invalid entry.

meta.name: Contact Element
meta.description: Encodes a DMR contact.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Encodes the name of the contact. Up to ASCII 16 chars, filled with ffh.

meta.name: DMR ID
meta.description: Specifies the DMR ID as a 8-digit BCD number in big endian.

meta.name: Call Type
meta.description: Specifies the call type.

item.name: All Call
item.description: Also implies a certain DMR ID.

element.unused:
Unused data Some unsued data, filled with 0100h R202409080
0100

meta.name: Time Slot Override
meta.description: Allows to override the time slot of the channel, if this contact is selected as the current transmit contact.

item.name: None
item.description: Do not override the time slot of the channel.

item.name: Time Slot 1
item.description: Overrides the channel time slot with TS1.

item.name: Time Slot 2
item.description: Overrides the channel time slot with TS2.

meta.name: Group List Bank
meta.description: Consists of a lenght array for each of the 64 group lists and the actual group lists.

meta.name: Length Array
meta.description: Specifies the number of entries for each of the valid group lists.

meta.name: Length
meta.description: Specifies the number of elements +1 of the corresponding group list.

meta.name: Group Lists
meta.description: Up to 76 group lists.

meta.name: Group List
meta.description: Encodes a group list.

meta.name: Name
meta.description: Specifies the name of the group list.
